abstract: Economic events for the week of Nov. 24, 2008.
snippet: Economic events for the week of Nov. 24, 2008.
lead_paragraph: THANKSGIVING WEEK The bond markets will close at 2 p.m. on Wednesday in advance of the Thanksgiving holiday on Thursday, when markets and government offices will be closed. Friday will be a shortened trading day, with stock markets closing at 1 p.m. and bond markets at 2 p.m.
